tool_description: Creates detailed audit trails for all inventory movements and adjustments, maintaining compliance records and transaction history for reporting and analysis.

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction being logged

movement_type.description: Type of movement: adjustment, transfer, sale, purchase, return, or correction

quantity_change.description: Quantity change (positive for increases, negative for decreases)

user_id.description: User ID who performed the action

error_messages: Invalid movement type: Use one of [adjustment, transfer, sale, purchase, return, correction].
Missing location information: location_to is required for transfer movements.
Invalid transaction ID: Transaction ID already exists in audit log.
Database write error: Unable to write audit record to database.
Invalid user ID: User ID not found in system.
usage: Provide transaction details including SKU, movement type, quantity change, and user information. For transfers, specify both location_from and location_to.

log_entry_id.description: Unique identifier for the created log entry

logged_successfully.description: Whether the log entry was successfully created

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the log entry was created

audit_trail_reference.description: Reference number for audit trail compliance
